title: Celebrity X Factor Ricki Lake's heartbreaking final visit to her ex before his death
text:

When TV legend Ricki Lake's ex-husband died on Febrary 11, 2017, her world fell apart.

Celebrity X Factor star Ricki issued a heartbroken statement about the loss of her soulmate.

In it the 51-year-old said: "It is with a heavy heart that I share that my beloved soulmate, Christian Evans, has passed.

"The world didn't understand this man but I did. He succumbed to his life long struggle with bipolar disorder.

"For anyone who has ever lost a family member of friend to mental illness, my heart goes out to you.

(Image: WireImage)

"I am a greater person for having known him and spent the past six and a half years of my life with him.

"He was a man of love and what mends my broken heart today is knowing that he is finally at peace and his spirit is free.Rest in peace my love."

Ricki, who had an award-winning talk show, met jewellery designer Christina in 2009.

The couple announced their engagement in 2011 and married the following year.

But by October 2014, Ricki had filed for divorced, citing 'irreconcilable differences'.

(Image: Getty Images)

The couple seemed to be back on track by December that year and announced they had put their divorce on hold.

But the following year their permanent split was finalised and the couple were divorced.

Christian had struggled with bipolar throughout his life.

In the months before his death, however, Christian was working on a prokect to help the homeless in Los Angeles.

Just three days before he passed away, Ricki visited her ex-husband - she did not know it would be the final time she would see him alive.

(Image: Jim Smeal/BEI/REX/Shutterstock)

She said: "I didn't know it was the last time. I didn't know it eas goodbye.

"He wasn't stable and he was so fragile but I was still in love with him, so there was something romantic about it.

"I wanted to save him. Looking back I can see he was resigned."

Christian sent his ex-wife one final text message on the day of her last visit.

It said: "Thank you for making time for me, being around your spirit is the first time my soul had been at ease and felt calm in a very long time and last night was sacred healing for my heart.

(Image: FilmMagic)

"I cherish every moment. Good night, I love you angel."

Just three days later, Ricki was told her ex-husband was dead.

She was utterly heartbroken and has opened up about how her dog, Mama, helped her cope with her grief.

Appearing on Loose Women, Ricki said: "She became my legal therapy dog after my husband took his life and succumbed to mental illness.

"Mama literally saved me, I mean I'm not overstating to say that she saved me. I'd say she's the best decision I made."

Walking Mama meant the Hairspray star had to get outside, walking, while she was still mourning Christian.

Ricki has also since found love again with Jeffrey Scult since Christian's tragic death - and says she knows she has his blessing.

She told the Loose Women panel: "I know he is proud of me, I know he is with me, I know he helped me meet this new love in my life.

"I believe they are very similar, I do have a type but I do believe he wants me to find love again - he doesn't want me alone and I like to believe he has a hand in helping me find him."
description: Ricki's husband, Christian Evans, died after a lifelong battle with bipolar disorder in 2017
